title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, #2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count

Meet the classroom- and office-favorite pencil trusted for over a century. Ticonderoga’s premium wood-cased pencils deliver smooth, consistent writing performance right out of the box—no sharpening required.

Key features:
- Smooth, reliable writing: Exclusive #2 HB graphite formula with a thick core for dark, consistent lines and reduced breakage.
- Premium wood: Crafted from high-quality wood harvested from responsibly managed forests for clean, easy sharpening.
- Signature finish: Classic golden yellow lacquer with a comfortable matte coating for a secure grip.
- Ready to write: Pre-sharpened to precise points, saving time for classrooms, tests, and busy workdays.
- Clean erasing: Latex-free, smudge-free eraser removes marks completely without tearing paper; signature green-and-gold ferrule for durability and style.
- Safe and trusted: PMA certified non-toxic; preferred by teachers and backed by over 100 years of craftsmanship from Ticonderoga, part of the Dixon Ticonderoga family of brands.

What’s in the box:
- 30 pre-sharpened Ticonderoga #2 HB soft pencils in classic yellow with green-and-gold ferrules and latex-free erasers.

Perfect for:
- Test-taking, note-taking, journaling, sketching, list-making, classrooms, offices, and home use.

Choose Ticonderoga for premium performance, clean erasing, and dependable quality you can feel in every stroke.
